name: Friday Night Funkin' I'm Sorry Chef Pee Pee V1
name_original: Friday Night Funkin' I'm Sorry Chef Pee Pee V1
description:
Well here it is... 

the official v1 release!

expect major changes upon v2 and sorry for the low-quality stuff that will change too

What is "I'm Sorry Chef Pee Pee"

i'm sorry chef pee pee is a sml creepypasta based around junior destroying chef pee pee's head. junior makes a joke about chef pee pee's new head and then chef pee pee kills junior while junior repeats the phrase "im sorry chef peepee"

(not a very good creepypasta)

poor old peepee...

Note from roomsofdeath: so we were going to add a death animation but i was really excited to publish the mod when the song was all finished and stuff so i just published it and forgot that the death anim existed but we will add in v2.

also some parts of the credits tab are unfinished lmao credits to:roomsofdeath
